definitions.title: vb. denom.
definitions.body: acquire by paying purchase-price (Ar. mahara give a dowry, marry for a mahrun; cf. Gerber:Verb. denom. 12 Buhl SS);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[מָהָָרוּ]] Ps 16:4 usu. obtain another in exchange (or, by paying a price, cf. Che), but txt. dub.; Impf. 3 ms. sf.+ Inf. abs. [[מָהׂר יִמְהָרֶנָּה לוֹ לְאִשָּׁה]] Ex 22:15 (E).
